message: The image on the screens suddenly changes.
That's... the Old Residential District?!

<4line><voice name='東江' class='東江' src='voice/dm52/2000020b02'>
"I'm sorry to say that when Platinum Jail was constructed, not everyone accepted our vision. This is where the islanders who refused to cooperate with us live."

name: 東江
message: "Matters were tense between us for a time, but now, little by little, the islanders are coming around."

name: 東江
message: "This event is being broadcasted to the Old Residential District, so that they may enjoy it as well. Please, observe."
Exuberant shouts and applause rise from the crowd.
I stare open-mouthed at the screens, my headache forgotten.
Those are the streets of my home. I know them like the back of my hand.
But now... I hardly recognize them.
Everyone is standing still, staring at the closest screen―entranced, just like the people here were.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...No way."
Toue claimed that they were "coming around" to his vision.
But that was a lie. Almost nobody back home was on Toue's side. There's no way it could change this fast.
I feel numb, like I'm watching a bad comedy sketch.
That blank look on everyone's faces...
It reminds me of Mizuki when he was being controlled by Morphine.
My headache is getting worse, but I have more important things to worry about.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Ren? I don't like the looks of this."
Ren is watching from inside my bag.

name: 蓮
message: "Yes. This isn't normal."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are they being controlled?"

name: 蓮
message: "That seems highly probable."
It's just like Granny said. Toue is trying to control all the people on the island, including those back home.
...Granny. Is she okay?
Koujaku, Noiz, Mink, Clear...

Mr. Haga, Ms. Yoshie, the brats...
Everyone...

name: 東江
message: "Soon, they too will join us in paradise. And when that time comes, I hope you will all receive them with open arms, as friends."
The crowd cheers.
...These people have no idea.
They don't know a damn thing about what's really going on. They don't even care. They're just dancing to Toue's tune.
This isn't even about his mind control tech or whatever. Even without that, these idiots here would swallow any shit he fed them.
Anything that'll let them go on being happy, dancing zombies.
A world without pain. Toue might call that happiness, but he couldn't be more wrong.
And yet, these people think he's the fucking messiah.
...What a joke.
How can they be so fucking blind?!

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Hurray for the Old Residential District!!!"
I glare at the man next to me, but he keeps going.

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Hurray for the Old Residential District! Hurray for To―urk!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up."
I grab him by the collar and pull his face close.

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Wh-What's your problem?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut your fucking mouth."

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Why're you mad? Didn't you hear what Toue said? We've gotta free our minds to be happy and―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up!!!"

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Eek!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"
Ren's shout stops me just as I raise my fist.

name: 蓮
message: "Calm down."

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Eeeek!"
I loosen my grip on his collar and the man scrambles away into the crowd.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Fuck!"
Rage flares in my chest. Rage at Toue, rage at these fools watching him ruin my home with smiles on their faces...
But most of all, rage at myself for being powerless to stop it!

name: 蓮
message: "If you cause a scene now, you'll lose your chance."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know! But I can't just...!"

name: 蓮
message: "Remember. You have a habit of letting your emotions get the better of you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh, well what the fuck do you expect after hearing that shit?!"
What's happening to me? Lashing out at Ren?
I mean, sure, this headache's driving me crazy...
...but that's not an excuse.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry. I just... You're right. I'm sorry."

name: 蓮
message: "...It's fine."
